title: Betti's Imbiss - Food Truck
typeOfFood: Fast food, German, Take-out only, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Food truck situated in Duisburg-Kasslerfeld. It's a typical German food truck offering sausages and fries, but offers each day at least 2 meals and at 1 vegetarian/vegan special. Phone one day in advance, a special meal can be prepared for you.
